attributes.action: stop proposing to pay Taleban supporters in Afghanistan to change sides
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a proposal to use up to £500 million to pay Taleban supporeters to switch to the Government side. This is UK taxpayers' money we are talking about: how many jobs could be saved, or debts repaid, with such asn enormous sum of money? And what's to stop Afghans taking the money, then going back to the Taleban, overtly or secretly?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
